description:
A unified interface for LLMs. OpenRouter is an API that can be used with most AI SDKs, and has a very similar format to OpenAI's own API.

1. Navigate to the OpenRouter API key management page at https://openrouter.ai/keys.
2. Click on the "Create Key" button to generate a new API key.
3. Once you have your API key, open your plugin settings. In the Authorization key field, enter your API key in the following format: Bearer API_KEY, replacing API_KEY with the actual key you generated.
name: Open Router AI
plugin_instructions:
1. Navigate to the OpenRouter API key management page at https://openrouter.ai/keys.
2. Click on the "Create Key" button to generate a new API key.
3. Once you have your API key, open your plugin settings. In the Authorization key field, enter your API key in the following format: Bearer API_KEY, replacing API_KEY with the actual key you generated.
